author: KdGaming0
name: ModrinthChecker
description: A comprehensive cog to monitor Modrinth projects (mods, modpacks, resource packs, shaders) for updates and send notifications to Discord channels with rich embeds and changelogs.
install_msg: Thank you for installing ModrinthChecker! Use `[p]modrinth add <project_id>` to start monitoring a project.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores project monitoring configurations per guild including project IDs, notification channels, and role mentions. No personal data is stored.
